feed.title: moving the default display to mbtc

entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: In a mailing list thread on March 13th, 2014, Mike Hearn stated that the standard for Bitcoin has become mBTC. However, Jeff Garzik, a Bitcoin core developer and open source evangelist, disagreed with this statement. Garzik expressed that just because Hearn said something does not mean it is true or a good idea to adopt. Garzik is also affiliated with BitPay, Inc.
